word: AND SHE WEPT JUST LIKE A CHILD, AND JUST SEEMED LIKE SHE COULD NOT STAND IT BECAUSE THAT THE LORD SHOWED HER THE CONDITION OF OUR PEOPLE--SOON THE PLAGUES WOULD FALL, AND THEY WERE UNREADY. THERE WAS NO MEETING IN PROGRESS, AND THE SPIRIT OF THE LORD CAME UPON HER AS SHE WENT ONTO THE CAMPGROUND, AND (TURNING TO MRS. MACKIN) YOU MAY TELL HER WHAT WORDS YOU SANG.
